title: Impulse from floor on bouncing ball

content.question: A ball of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is dropped from rest at a height <math alttext="h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and collides elastically with the floor, rebounding to its original height. What is the magnitude of the net impulse on the ball during the collision with the floor?

choices.label: <math alttext="m times the square root of g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi><msqrt><mrow><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="m times the square root of 2 g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="m times the square root of 4 g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi><msqrt><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="m times the square root of 8 g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi><msqrt><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="m times the square root of 8 g h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi><msqrt><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>g</mi><mi>h</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
